name: uncandid
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not honest and telling the truth: This is the last place I would have expected to encounter such uncandid and ungenerous treatment.
More examplesFewer examplesHe knew he was not addressing an uncandid judge in such a kindly disposed lady.The accounts that were passed on were not altogether free of uncandid alterations.He was evidently deeply hurt at the uncandid treatment he conceived he had met with.
